name: Sky ETF
description: The Sky ETF (SKYY) is an exchange-traded fund that provides investors with exposure to companies that are involved in cloud computing and related technologies. Launched by First Trust Advisors, SKYY aims to track the performance of the ISE Cloud Computing Index, which includes firms that derive a substantial portion of their revenue from the cloud computing sector. This rapidly growing industry encompasses a wide range of services, including cloud infrastructure, software as a service (SaaS), and platform as a service (PaaS). The fund includes major players in the market such as Amazon Web Services, Microsoft Azure, and Salesforce, as well as smaller, innovative companies focused on cloud technology. With the increasing reliance on digital solutions and remote work, cloud computing has become essential for businesses worldwide. The Sky ETF offers a diversified approach to investing in this trend, allowing investors to capitalize on the growth of the cloud sector while mitigating risk through a portfolio of various companies. As organizations continue to transition to cloud-based solutions, SKYY aims to provide a compelling investment opportunity for those looking to participate in the digital transformation of the economy.

seo.meta_title: Sky ETF (SKYY) | Invest in Cloud Computing
seo.meta_description: Invest in the future of technology with Sky ETF (SKYY), focusing on cloud computing companies. Explore diverse opportunities in the growing cloud sector.

faq.question: What is SKYY?
faq.answer: SKYY is an exchange-traded fund that provides exposure to companies involved in cloud computing.

faq.question: Who manages the Sky ETF?
faq.answer: The Sky ETF is managed by First Trust Advisors.

faq.question: What sectors does SKYY invest in?
faq.answer: SKYY primarily invests in the technology and cloud computing sectors.
